availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Harvey W. Mitchell (Mercer County, KY, Farmer)

body.p: Mercer County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married Malvina V. Williams Mitchell in Anderson County, Kentucky on June 17, 1843. Father of Mary E. Mitchell, Bettie W. Mitchell, and Basil B. Mitchell. Farmer in Mercer County, Kentucky in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedule, Kentucky, Mercer County, p. 792.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Anderson County Marriages, Film #000259309, p. 277
